sourcesContent:
import './PersonalInfo.css' function PersonalInfo({ state, Dispatch, handleTextInput}) { return (

Personal info

Please provide your name, email address, and phone number.

Dispatch({type:"theName",payload:e.target.value})} autoComplete='on' name='fullName' type='text' id='name' className='p-md-3 mb-md-2 mb-2 p-2' placeholder='e.g ds King' />
) } export default PersonalInfo
